name: The confident pirate who never stops
name_original: The confident pirate who never stops
description:
A puzzle game about control floating islands to guide our pirate who never stops.

Game made for the TRIJAM #179 under the theme Floating Island.

Controls: Mouse drag and drop

Goal: Reach the big treasure.

Engine: Godot

--Credits--

Code: Marx E. Brasil

Art: Francesco Lemos

Music: João Alves
